meanings.definition: In a joking or playful manner.
meanings.sent1: She jocularly teased her friend about his new haircut.
meanings.sent2: He always speaks jocularly during our lunch breaks.
meanings.sent3: The children laughed jocularly as they played tag in the park.
meanings.sent4: The comedian jocularly poked fun at the audience's fashion choices.
meanings.sent5: The clown jocularly juggled colorful balls to entertain the crowd.

meanings.sent1: His jocularly nature made him the life of the party.
meanings.sent2: The jocularly atmosphere at the comedy club put everyone in a good mood.
meanings.sent3: The jocularly group of friends always had a smile on their faces.
meanings.sent4: The jocularly tone of the conversation lightened the mood in the room.
meanings.sent5: Her jocularly comments kept everyone laughing throughout the evening.
